evidence.claim: Anytime Pediatrics utilizes AWS services for cloud infrastructure and data storage.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations, indicating their use of secure health data transaction sets.
They implement FHIR standards for interoperability with health data systems.
Their APIs are built with RESTful principles for integration with third-party applications.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or EDI-related use cases found on public site.
